LanguageData.Jerbal.label: jerbal
LanguageData.Jerbal.description: A large kangaroo-like gerbil adapted to desert environments. It uses its tail to store fat. It can go for long periods without eating when food is unavailable.
LanguageData.Jerbal.tools.left_leg.label: left leg
LanguageData.Jerbal.tools.right_leg.label: right leg
